name: Microsoft OneDrive Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft OneDrive Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Microsoft OneDrive API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Microsoft OneDrive API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: file
available_options: File (值: file)
Folder (值: folder)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getChildren
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a folder
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a folder
Get Children (值: getChildren) - Get items inside a folder
Rename (值: rename) - Rename a folder
Search (值: search) - Search a folder
Share (值: share) - Share a folder

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: name (值: None) - The new name for the copy. If this isn't provided, the same name will be used as the original.

parentReference.name: parentReference
parentReference.description: Reference to the parent item the copy will be created in  Details
parentReference.natural_language_description: 参数名: Parent Reference | 作用: Reference to the parent item the copy will be created in  Details | 默认值: {}
available_options: driveId (值: None) - Identifier of the drive instance that contains the item
driveType (值: None) - Identifies the type of drive
id (值: None) - Identifier of the item in the drive
listId (值: None) - Identifier of the list
name (值: None) - The name of the item being referenced
path (值: None) - Path that can be used to navigate to the item
shareId (值: None) - Identifier for a shared resource that can be accessed via the Shares API
siteId (值: None) - Identifier of the site

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written | 默认值: data | (必填项)

itemId.name: itemId
itemId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Item ID | 作用: ID of the folder

newName.name: newName
newName.natural_language_description: 参数名: New Name | 作用: New name for folder

query.name: query
query.description: The query text used to search for items. Values may be matched across several fields including filename, metadata, and file content.
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query | 作用: The query text used to search for items. Values may be matched across several fields including filename, metadata, and file content.

type.name: type
type.description: The type of sharing link to create
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: The type of sharing link to create
available_options: View (值: view)
Edit (值: edit)
Embed (值: embed)

scope.name: scope
scope.description: The type of sharing link to create
scope.natural_language_description: 参数名: Scope | 作用: The type of sharing link to create
available_options: Anonymous (值: anonymous)
Organization (值: organization)

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: The name the file should be saved as
fileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Name | 作用: The name the file should be saved as

parentId.name: parentId
parentId.description: ID of the parent folder that will contain the file
parentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Parent ID | 作用: ID of the parent folder that will contain the file | (必填项)

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field
binaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 作用: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field | 默认值: False | (必填项)

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file
fileContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Content | 作用: The text content of the file | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: The name or path of the folder
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name or path of the folder | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: parentFolderId (值: None) - ID of the folder you want to crate the new folder in

folderId.name: folderId
folderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder ID | 作用: File ID
